snippet: Northern Badakshan Province is far from insurgent strongholds and had been generally peaceful until recent months.
abstract: Taliban insurgents kill as many as 17 Afghan National Army soldiers in Afghanistan's northern Badakhshan Province, area that has been generally peaceful.

byline.contributor: Sharifullah Sahak and Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Northern Badakshan Province is far from insurgent strongholds and had been generally peaceful until recent months.

headline.seo: Taliban Kill 17 Afghan Soldiers in Once-Quiet Region
headline.main: Taliban Kill 17 Afghan Soldiers in Once-Quiet Area
headline.print_headline: Taliban Kill 17 Afghan Soldiers in Once-Quiet Area
